review.title: “Good results in unpredictable economy, good start with limited scope”
review.pros: Pros – Value oriented company culture, supportive colleagues, friendly staff and a visionary GM. The company had developed a strong market presence for Gartner within 2 years and accomplished great results in the region.
review.cons: Cons – He is always busy. The company is not (yet) financially strong but it is developing. He should manage through the next 1-2 year successfully to stabilise its market position and financial background.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
